sentences.en: "A good night's sleep is what you want," he said firmly.
sentences.cn: “你现在需要好好睡一晚上，”他不容分辩地说。

sentences.cn: “必须坚决让社团主义时代成为过去，”他宣布道。

sentences.en: Forensic evidence points the finger of suspicion firmly at him.
sentences.cn: 法医的证据将怀疑的矛头明确地指向了他。

sentences.en: He is firmly convinced that it is vital to do this.
sentences.cn: 他坚信做这件事至关重要。

sentences.en: His team retreated last night with tails tucked firmly between their legs.
sentences.cn: 昨晚，他的队伍灰溜溜地退场了。

sentences.cn: 我坚信我们的策略正在被人存心恶意操纵。

sentences.cn: 这个传统同样深深地植根于过去。
